description:
When you seek a full-service law firm that will provide you with innovative solutions tailored to your needs, come to Kelleher + Holland, LLC. Headquartered in North Barrington, Illinois, we serve the entire Chicago area and the Fort Lauderdale, FL area. In addition, our attorneys hold licenses to practice not only in Illinois but also in Arizona, California, Florida, Missouri, Texas, Wisconsin and Wyoming.

From simple wills to the most complex estate planning, the estate planning attorneys in our law firm possess the education, knowledge, background, capabilities and dedication to work closely with you to achieve your goals in the following areas:

  • Asset protection planning
  • Spousal lifetime access trusts
  • Grantor retained annuity trusts
  • Domestic and offshore trusts
  • Family limited partnerships and limited liability companies

As a full-service law firm, we realize that your legal needs likely will evolve over time and you, your family and your business may well need help and protection in a wide range of areas. Consequently, we also provide superior legal advice, counsel and representation in other aspects of your life, such as the following:

  • Family law and divorce
  • Personal injury
  • Employment law
  • Corporate law
  • Commercial and residential real estate
  • Civil and criminal litigation
Kelleher + Holland, LLC, offers virtual appointments to protect your health and give you peace of mind.
